data.title: The Daily Citizen
data.meta_description: Jerry Roberts passed away. This is the full obituary where you can share condolences and memories. Published in the The Daily Citizen on 2014-03-03.
data.text:
Jerry Steve Roberts, 78, of Cartersville and formerly of Lawrenceville, passed away on Sunday, March 2, 2014.

He is survived by his daughters and sons-in-law, Peggy and Calvin Dye of Lawrenceville, Sheila and Richard Peabody of Chatsworth, Patty and Michael Rutledge of Lawrenceville, and Susan and Doug Hayes of Calhoun; grandchildren, Arman Ferguson of Chatsworth, Steven Perez of Panama City Beach, Fla., Nick Dye of Dacula, Ashley Rutledge and Jessica Rutledge of Lawrenceville, and Hayden Hayes of Calhoun; great-grandchildren, Shania Ferguson, Shi-Anna Ferguson, December Garrett, Mateo Perez and Gavyn Dye; sisters and brothers-in-law, Ann and Andy Whitlow of Gainesville, Bonnie and Cliff Donald, Faye and Buster Kilpatrick, and Sonja and Bobby Flores; brother, Larry Roberts, all of Lawrenceville; nieces, nephews, cousins and extended family and friends; and his longtime companion of 26 years, Barbara Morgan.

Jerry was preceded in death by his father, J.P. Roberts; mother, Jessie Franklin Roberts; and grandson, Blake Dye.

Jerry was born and raised in Lawrenceville. He worked in the plastic industry for more than 50 years and was a partner in several of the plastic businesses, working in Norcross, Dalton and Cartersville. He loved the plastic industry and fishing, but most of all, he loved his family.

A funeral service to honor and celebrate the life of Jerry Roberts will be Wednesday at 1 p.m. at Tom M. Wages Lawrenceville Chapel. Pastor Marty Cason will officiate.

Interment will follow in Oakland Community Cemetery in Lawrenceville.

The family will receive friends today from 2 to 8 p.m. at the funeral home.

Condolences may be expressed or viewed at www.wagesfuneralhome.com.

Tom M. Wages Funeral Service LLC, "A Family Company" in Lawrenceville, has been entrusted with the arrangements; (770) 963-2411.
